description.value:
Your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} level for herbalism increases to your level -3.

You gain the formulas for elixirs of life as soon as your advanced alchemy level is high enough to create them: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{lesser} at 8th level, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{moderate} at 12th level, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{greater} at 16th level, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AmxSqEoFhRLMYd1W]{major} at 18th level.
